title: Login success with valid credentials and hCaptcha
description: Verify that a user can login successfully with correct email and password when hCaptcha validation is passed.

steps.description: Navigate to login page.
Input valid email and password.
Complete hCaptcha verification successfully.
Click login button.
System authenticates user and redirects to home/dashboard.

title: Login failure with invalid credentials
description: Verify that the system rejects login attempts with incorrect email or password and shows an appropriate error message.

steps.description: Navigate to login page.
Input invalid email or incorrect password.
Complete hCaptcha verification successfully.
Click login button.
System refuses login and displays clear error message about invalid credentials.

title: Prevent login submission without hCaptcha verification
description: Verify that login form cannot be submitted unless the hCaptcha is successfully completed.

steps.description: Navigate to login page.
Input valid email and password.
Do NOT complete the hCaptcha verification.
Attempt to submit the login form.
Form submission is blocked and user is prompted to complete hCaptcha.

title: Signup success with valid data and hCaptcha
description: Verify that a user can successfully register using valid email, password, and after completing hCaptcha.

steps.description: Navigate to signup page.
Input valid email and password.
Complete hCaptcha verification successfully.
Submit the signup form.
Account is created and user is directed to OTP verification or profile completion.

title: Signup failure with missing/invalid hCaptcha
description: Verify that signup cannot proceed if hCaptcha is not completed or invalid.

steps.description: Navigate to signup page.
Input valid email and password.
Do not complete hCaptcha or trigger an invalid hCaptcha state.
Attempt to submit signup form.
Form submission is blocked with clear warning to complete hCaptcha.

title: Cart add product with stock availability enforcement
description: Verify that adding a product to the cart respects stock limits and updates the cart UI optimistically.

steps.description: Browse to product listing.
Add an available product to the cart.
Product is added instantly (optimistic UI) and cart quantity updates accordingly.
Try to add more quantity than available stock.
System prevents exceeding stock and shows an informative error message.

title: Cart quantity adjustment with stock limit validation
description: Verify that users can adjust product quantities in cart without exceeding stock and UI updates totals correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to cart page with products added.
Increase quantity of a product within available stock.
Quantity updates and total price recalculates immediately including VAT and shipping.
Attempt to increase quantity beyond stock.
Quantity change is prevented and a clear error message is displayed.

title: Cart deletion functionality
description: Verify that users can remove products from the cart and that the totals update correctly afterwards.

steps.description: Navigate to cart page.
Delete a product from the cart.
Product is removed immediately and total price updates accordingly including VAT and shipping.

title: Cart persistence across page reloads
description: Verify that cart contents remain consistent and available after a browser reload using localStorage synchronization.

steps.description: Add several products to cart.
Reload the page.
Cart contents and totals remain intact and accurately shown.

title: Checkout address selection and order summary accuracy
description: Verify that user can select an address during checkout and that order summary including VAT, shipping and promo codes is accurately displayed.

steps.description: Navigate to checkout page with cart items.
Select a shipping address from the user's address book.
Verify that the order summary updates accordingly to reflect address selection impacts.
Order summary correctly calculates total price with VAT and shipping based on selected address.

title: Apply valid promo code during checkout
description: Verify that when a user applies a valid promo code, the backend validates it and the discount is applied correctly in the order summary.

steps.description: Navigate to checkout page.
Enter a valid promo code and apply it.
Promo code is validated with backend and discount is applied correctly to the total.

title: Reject invalid promo code with error message
description: Verify that when an invalid or expired promo code is entered, backend validation rejects it and shows a clear error message to the user.

steps.description: Navigate to checkout page.
Enter an invalid promo code and apply it.
System displays an informative error message about invalid promo code and does not apply discount.

title: Successful order placement with backend validation
description: Verify that after completing checkout steps and confirming order, the backend validates the order details and creates the order successfully.

steps.description: Complete all checkout steps including address selection and promo code application.
Confirm and submit the order.
Backend confirms order validity and creates order record successfully.
User is shown a confirmation message or page.

title: User profile update personal settings
description: Verify that users can update personal settings such as name, email (except password here), and those changes are saved and reflected immediately.

steps.description: Navigate to profile settings page.
Modify personal setting fields.
Save changes.
Changes are saved successfully and updated data is shown.

title: User address book add/edit/delete addresses
description: Verify that users can add new addresses, edit existing addresses, and delete addresses in the address book with expected validations.

steps.description: Navigate to the user address book page.
Add a new valid address and save.
New address appears in the address list.
Edit an existing address and save.
Address details are updated accordingly.
Delete an address.
Address is removed from the address book.

title: Admin login and access control enforcement
description: Verify that only admin users can login to the admin dashboard and that non-admin users are prevented from accessing admin pages.

steps.description: Attempt to login to admin dashboard with admin credentials.
Admin successfully logs in and access is granted to admin pages.
Attempt to access admin dashboard with non-admin user credentials.
Access is denied and user is redirected or shown permission error.

title: Admin update shipment tracking number and order status
description: Verify that admin users can update shipment tracking numbers and order status, that these updates are saved correctly in the database, and confirmation emails are sent to users.

steps.description: Login as admin and navigate to orders list.
Select an order and update shipment tracking number.
Change the order status (e.g., from pending to shipped).
Save changes.
Database records accurately reflect updated shipment info and status.
User receives a confirmation email about shipment and status update.

title: Order listing pagination and filtering in admin dashboard
description: Verify that the admin order list supports pagination and filtering by order status and date correctly.

steps.description: Login as admin and open the orders list page.
Apply filters by order status (e.g., pending, shipped).
Only orders matching the selected status are displayed.
Navigate through pagination controls.
Orders page updates correctly with consistent data loads.
